text:
1. Soni Razdan & Swara Bhasker Slam Anupam Kher For His Dig At Artists' Vote Appeal Against BJP!
About 700 theatre artists including names such as Naseeruddin Shah, Ratna Pathak Shah and Anurag Kashyap have urged people to vote against BJP in this year’s election, which they say are “the most critical in the history of independent India”.
2. As If His Clean-Shaven Look Wasn't Enough, Kit Harington Startled Fans With A Striptease On SNL
Kit Harington made his debut on Saturday Night Live recently, and proved that when it comes to importance of facial hair, especially a beard, ‘he knows nothing.’ Why would he do that, right? Join us in paying respects to his spectacular beard which is no more between us.
3. Indian Fans Troll & Unfollow British Actress Daisy Edgar Jones After She Walks Out Of Rajamouli’s RRR
Don't Miss 159 SHARES 842 SHARES
Why has she opted out of the project? The official Twitter handle of movie RRR says it happened “Due to unavoidable circumstances.” Daisy Edgar Jones on her Instagram wrote that it happened due to “family circumstances”. Calling it a “wonderful film”, she said that the script is brilliant and her character is great too. She wished the team all the best.
4. Farhan Akhtar & Shibani Dandekar’s Pics Will Give You All The Inspiration You Need To Plan A Summer Vacay ASAP!
Farhan Akhtar and Shibani Dandekar are seemingly having a ball in Mexico!
5. After Shah Rukh Khan Opts Out Of Don 3, Makers Reportedly Approach Ranveer Singh & Katrina Kaif
It is said that after Shah Rukh Khan opted out of the movie citing personal problems, Producer Ritesh Sidhwani and Farhan Akhtar‘s banner Excel Entertainment has approved Ranveer Singh for the role. It is also said that Katrina Kaif has been approached to play the leading lady.
title: Soni Razdan Slams Anupam Kher, Clean-Shaven Kit Harington Makes His SNL Debut & More From Ent
description: Kit Harington made his debut on Saturday Night Live recently, and proved that when it comes to importance of facial hair, especially a beard, ‘he knows nothing.’ Why would he do that, right? Join us in paying respects to his spectacular beard which is no more between us.
